TitleEnglish: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
SummaryEnglish: Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy’s expectations by developing “magicology,” a unique magical theory based on memories from her past life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom’s next monarch. That’s when Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name-which somehow involves them living together and researching magic!  Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom...and the entire world!
Aliases: Tensei Ōjo to Tensai Reijō no Mahō Kakumei
Tensei Oujo to Tensai Reijou no Mahou Kakumei

1.TitleEnglish: The Magical Revolution of the Princess and the Young Lady
1.SummaryEnglish: Anisphia, a princess who has retained her memories from her previous life, has spent her nights doing some kind of shady research to fulfill her dream of using magic to fly. One night, she takes a test flight with her special witch's broom, but crash-lands in the middle of the noble academy's soirée. There, she sees Prince Algard publicly breaking off his engagement with the duke's genius daughter, Euphyllia...

2.TitleEnglish: Acquisition of an Assistant for Both Profit and Pleasure
2.SummaryEnglish: After Euphyllia's engagement is annulled in front of her peers, Anisphia swoops in and carries her off. She returns to the palace and tells both girls's fathers that she wants Euphyllia to be her assistant, in hopes that it will restore the humiliated Euphyllia's honor. Thus the two of them begin to live together in a bizarre new arrangement...

3.TitleEnglish: The Rainbow Magic Sword of Longing and Reminiscence
3.SummaryEnglish: Anisphia and Euphyllia have begun living together, but Euphyllia hasn't quite gotten used to her new environment, her new job, or her new position, and seems to simply be at the mercy of Anisphia. She seems a bit down, so Anisphia tells her she's making a special magic tool just for her.

4.TitleEnglish: The Princess and the Lost Child Announce Their Decision
4.SummaryEnglish: Euphyllia is sick with fatigue from dealing with her new and unfamiliar lifestyle, but with Anisphia's gentle nursing and warm words, she quickly recovers. Ilia tells Euphyllia about her own past and Anisphia's true intentions, finally giving Euphyllia an idea of who she should strive to be. But then an unexpected urgent message arrives from the adventurers' guild...

5.TitleEnglish: A Magic Medicine and a Magic Sword Subjugate a Magic Dragon
5.SummaryEnglish: Anisphia struggles to face the dragon with only her magical tools and ingenuity, but its power is overwhelming on a scale unlike anything she's faced before. Eventually, Euphyllia cannot bear to watch her any longer...

6.TitleEnglish: Getting to the Truth of the Annulment and the Fascination
6.SummaryEnglish: After obtaining the dragon's magicite, Anisphia and Euphyllia visit Tilty, Anisphia's friend and research partner, in hopes of developing new technology with it. Anisphia is giddy with excitement, but then she receives word of the continuing investigation into the annulment of Euphyllia's engagement...

7.TitleEnglish: The Magic Lecture of the Founder and the Assistant
7.SummaryEnglish: Lainie is now living in Anisphia's villa on probation, and to allow research on her power of fascination. Anisphia and Tilty begin to investigate Lainie's ability, and as Euphyllia watches their friendly banter, an uneasy feeling comes over her. Then Anisphia is informed that she's been summoned to give a speech before the Ministry of the Arcane, which disagrees with her research, and Euphyllia speaks up...

8.TitleEnglish: The Magic Definition of the Monster and the Commoner
8.SummaryEnglish: Anisphia and Euphyllia have successfully completed their lecture before the Ministry of the Arcane. During the banquet held afterward, the alarm at Anisphia's villa sounds. Anisphia and Euphyllia rush back to the villa, but the sight awaiting them there is a heartbreaking one...

9.TitleEnglish: The Sister and Brother, and for Whom the Crown Is Intended
9.SummaryEnglish: Euphyllia watches the battle between Anisphia and Algard grow increasingly intense as she frantically works to heal Lainie and Ilia. Anisphia struggles against Algard's new vampiric powers, but she makes up her mind to take her younger brother's life if it means stopping his evil deeds. The love- and hate-filled battle between brother and sister—prince and princess—nears its end...

10.TitleEnglish: The Royal Succession of Resignation and Fury
10.SummaryEnglish: With Algard gone, Anisphia is the only one left to succeed the throne, so she begins acting as a future queen should. Euphyllia makes up her mind to support Anisphia as her assistant and subject, but when she sees the lab all cleaned up and Anisphia forcing herself to smile, her heart wavers...

11.TitleEnglish: The Spirit Contract of Despair and Determination
11.SummaryEnglish: Meeting Lumi, a spirit contractor, has solidified Euphyllia's determination to be the next monarch. Her only wish is to preserve Anisphia's dream and her smile, but there is a hidden truth behind the spirit contract. When Anisphia learns what it is, she's unable to bear it and runs out into the icy rain...

12.SummaryEnglish: "I don't want to let you become queen." "I don't want to let you give up everything." While Ilia and Lainie watch with bated breath, Anisphia and Euphyllia confront each other, each with her own conviction. Each one cares too much for the other to back down. When Anisphia strikes with all her strength, Euphyllia strikes with all her soul. Who will win this duel?
